name: Rally
description:
You refuse to give up when the tide turns.

Once per rest, if your Endurance is down to less than half its maximum, regain Endurance equal to your BODY score.

Describe how you keep fighting when others would falter.

improvements.name: Unyielding Rally
improvements.description: You may use Rally even if you are at 0 Endurance, immediately regaining Endurance and standing up.

improvements.name: Improved Rally
improvements.description: You instead regain twice your BODY score.

improvements.name: Rally for All
improvements.description: All allies within 10 feet also regain Endurance equal to your BODY score.
